title: Cant refund champion for rp?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I have 3 refunds remaining and I cannot refund the champion I bought with rp. I included gyazo. Can anyone help?

replies.body: Perhaps it's because you now have a skin for that champion, and that skin is not refundable.
Wait what the fuck... So im stuck with it? That seems really unfair.

You aren't stuck with them, but the system will in fact not let you refund a champion that you own a skin for. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and if the champ meets the refund criteria those agents should be able to help out still!
Look on the bright side. You have one less champion to collect, and one more champion with a skin that you can play with.
